post.title: is it possible to have a rogers iphone with data only? no voice plan.
post.content: i have an iphone that is off contract that i bought when i needed a new ipod, in hopes that telus' hspa network would be ready. but it looks like i have to wait until january. is it possible to use the iphone with a data only plan, with no voice plan? i need to keep my number with telus, and its in a contact, so i don't want to switch. sorry if this has been posted before.
